ReportBundle.ReportXML: <Report ReportGID="67b9b008-be3f-4b47-b8ea-a09991e415d1" ReportUseType="2" ReportType="5" ReportName="Daily Dairy Summary" Description="Overview of Yesterday, 3 Days, 7 Days and 15 Days" CreatedDT="2014-02-19T16:16:16.043" ModifiedDT="2014-05-21T15:59:14.763" ModifiedBy="VAS" ConcurrencyTS="AAAAAAAAZZk=" ReportVersion="0" />

ReportQuery.ReportQueryText:
<QueryBundle> <QueryText>select l.LocationName as PenName, p.PenNumber as PenNumber,
w.SumAF as YestAF, w.SumDM as YestDM, w.AFHd as YestAFHd, w.DMHd as YestDMHd, w.SumCost as YestCost, w.AvgPenCount as YestPenCount, w.AvgCostHd as YestCostHd,
x.SumAF as ThreeAF, x.SumDM as ThreeDM, x.AFHd as ThreeAFHd, x.DMHd as ThreeDMHd, x.SumCost as ThreeCost, x.AvgPenCount as ThreePenCount, x.AvgCostHd as ThreeCostHd,
y.SumAF as SevenAF, y.SumDM as SevenDM, y.AFHd as SevenAFHd, y.DMHd as SevenDMHd, y.SumCost as SevenCost, y.AvgPenCount as SevenPenCount, y.AvgCostHd as SevenCostHd,
z.SumAF as FifteenAF, z.SumDM as FifteenDM, z.AFHd as FifteenAFHd, z.DMHd as FifteenDMHd, z.SumCost as FifteenCost, z.AvgPenCount as FifteenPenCount, z.AvgCostHd as FifteenCostHd from Location l join Pen p on p.LocationGID = l.LocationGID
-- Yesterday left join ( select PenGID, LocationName as PenName, SumAF = sum(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity, c.MediumMeasurementType)), SumDM = sum(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity * DMPct, c.MediumMeasurementType)), SumCost = sum(cst.FIFOCost), AvgPenCount = avg(pcc.penCount), AvgCostHd = isnull(SUM(cst.FIFOCost) / nullif(AVG(pcc.penCount), 0),0), AFHd = isnull(SUM(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity, c.MediumMeasurementType) / nullif(pcc.penCount, 0)), 0), DMHd = isnull(SUM(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity * DMPct, c.MediumMeasurementType) / nullif(pcc.penCount, 0)), 0) from Location l join Pen p on p.LocationGID = l.LocationGID join FeedingScheduleDrop fsd on fsd.LocationGID = p.LocationGID join FeedingScheduleLoad fsl on fsl.FeedingScheduleLoadGID = fsd.FeedingScheduleLoadGID join InventoryTransaction it on it.TransactionSourceGID = fsd.FeedingScheduleDropGID join Company c on c.CompanyGID = l.CompanyGID outer apply (select top 1 FIFOCost = dbo.GetFIFOCost(it2.UnitQuantity, fsmi.InventoryItemGID, fsmi.SourceLocationGID, it2.TransactionDT) from FeedingScheduleMixInstruction fsmi join InventoryTransaction it2 on it2.TransactionSourceGID = fsmi.FeedingScheduleMixInstructionGID where it2.InventoryItemGID = it.InventoryItemGID and fsmi.FeedingScheduleMixGID = fsl.FeedingScheduleMixGID and DATEADD(second, -it2.durationseconds, it2.transactiondt) <= DATEADD(second, -it.durationseconds, it.transactiondt) order by it2.TransactionDT desc) cst outer apply (select top 1 pcc.[Count] * 1.0 penCount from PenCountChange pcc where pcc.PenGID = p.PenGID and pcc.CreatedDT <= it.TransactionDT order by pcc.CreatedDT desc) pcc where it.TransactionDT between convert(date,DATEADD(d, -1, getdate())) and convert(date, getdate()) group by PenGID, LocationName ) w on w.PenGID = p.PenGID
-- Three day left join ( select p.PenGID ,SumAF = SUM(d.DropAF) ,SumDM = SUM(d.DropDM) ,SumCost = SUM(d.SumCost) ,AvgPenCount = AVG(d.AvgPenCount) ,AvgCostHd = AVG(d.AvgCostHd) ,AFHd = AVG(d.AvgAFHd) ,DMHd = AVG(d.AvgDMHd) from ( select p.PenGID ,fs.InstanceDate as 'ReportDate' ,SUM(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity, c.MediumMeasurementType)) as 'DropAF' ,SUM(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity * DMPct, c.MediumMeasurementType)) as 'DropDM' ,AVG(pcc.penCount) as 'AvgPenCount' ,isnull(SUM(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity, c.MediumMeasurementType) / nullif(pcc.penCount, 0)), 0) as 'AvgAFHd' ,ISNULL(SUM(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity * DMPct, c.MediumMeasurementType) / nullif(pcc.penCount, 0)), 0) as 'AvgDMHd' ,SUM(cst.FIFOCost) as 'SumCost' ,isnull(SUM(cst.FIFOCost) / nullif(AVG(pcc.penCount), 0),0) as 'AvgCostHd' from Location l join Pen p on p.LocationGID = l.LocationGID join FeedingScheduleDrop fsd on fsd.LocationGID = p.LocationGID join FeedingScheduleLoad fsl on fsl.FeedingScheduleLoadGID = fsd.FeedingScheduleLoadGID join FeedingScheduleMix fsm on fsm.FeedingScheduleMixGID = fsl.FeedingScheduleMixGID join FeedingSchedule fs on fs.FeedingScheduleGID = fsm.FeedingScheduleGID join InventoryTransaction it on it.TransactionSourceGID = fsd.FeedingScheduleDropGID join Company c on c.CompanyGID = l.CompanyGID outer apply (select top 1 FIFOCost = dbo.GetFIFOCost(it2.UnitQuantity, fsmi.InventoryItemGID, fsmi.SourceLocationGID, it2.TransactionDT) from FeedingScheduleMixInstruction fsmi join InventoryTransaction it2 on it2.TransactionSourceGID = fsmi.FeedingScheduleMixInstructionGID where it2.InventoryItemGID = it.InventoryItemGID and fsmi.FeedingScheduleMixGID = fsl.FeedingScheduleMixGID order by it2.TransactionDT desc) cst outer apply (select top 1 pcc.[Count] * 1.0 as penCount from PenCountChange pcc where pcc.CreatedDT <= it.TransactionDT and pcc.PenGID = p.PenGID and pcc.InventoryItemType = 3 order by pcc.CreatedDT desc) pcc where it.TransactionDT between CONVERT(date, DATEADD(d, -3, GETDATE())) and CONVERT(date, GETDATE()) group by p.PenGID, fs.InstanceDate) d join Pen p on p.PenGID = d.PenGID group by p.PenGID ) x on x.PenGID = p.PenGID
-- Seven Day left join ( select p.PenGID ,SumAF = SUM(d.DropAF) ,SumDM = SUM(d.DropDM) ,SumCost = SUM(d.SumCost) ,AvgPenCount = AVG(d.AvgPenCount) ,AvgCostHd = AVG(d.AvgCostHd) ,AFHd = AVG(d.AvgAFHd) ,DMHd = AVG(d.AvgDMHd) from ( select p.PenGID ,fs.InstanceDate as 'ReportDate' ,SUM(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity, c.MediumMeasurementType)) as 'DropAF' ,SUM(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity * DMPct, c.MediumMeasurementType)) as 'DropDM' ,AVG(pcc.penCount) as 'AvgPenCount' ,isnull(SUM(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity, c.MediumMeasurementType) / nullif(pcc.penCount, 0)), 0) as 'AvgAFHd' ,ISNULL(SUM(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity * DMPct, c.MediumMeasurementType) / nullif(pcc.penCount, 0)), 0) as 'AvgDMHd' ,SUM(cst.FIFOCost) as 'SumCost' ,isNULL(SUM(cst.FIFOCost) /NULLIF(AVG(pcc.penCount), 0), 0) as 'AvgCostHd' from Location l join Pen p on p.LocationGID = l.LocationGID join FeedingScheduleDrop fsd on fsd.LocationGID = p.LocationGID join FeedingScheduleLoad fsl on fsl.FeedingScheduleLoadGID = fsd.FeedingScheduleLoadGID join FeedingScheduleMix fsm on fsm.FeedingScheduleMixGID = fsl.FeedingScheduleMixGID join FeedingSchedule fs on fs.FeedingScheduleGID = fsm.FeedingScheduleGID join InventoryTransaction it on it.TransactionSourceGID = fsd.FeedingScheduleDropGID join Company c on c.CompanyGID = l.CompanyGID outer apply (select top 1 FIFOCost = dbo.GetFIFOCost(it2.UnitQuantity, fsmi.InventoryItemGID, fsmi.SourceLocationGID, it2.TransactionDT) from FeedingScheduleMixInstruction fsmi join InventoryTransaction it2 on it2.TransactionSourceGID = fsmi.FeedingScheduleMixInstructionGID where it2.InventoryItemGID = it.InventoryItemGID and fsmi.FeedingScheduleMixGID = fsl.FeedingScheduleMixGID order by it2.TransactionDT desc) cst outer apply (select top 1 pcc.[Count] * 1.0 as penCount from PenCountChange pcc where pcc.CreatedDT <= it.TransactionDT and pcc.PenGID = p.PenGID and pcc.InventoryItemType = 3 order by pcc.CreatedDT desc) pcc where it.TransactionDT between CONVERT(date, DATEADD(d, -7, GETDATE())) and CONVERT(date, GETDATE()) group by p.PenGID, fs.InstanceDate) d join Pen p on p.PenGID = d.PenGID group by p.PenGID ) y on y.PenGID = p.PenGID left join ( select p.PenGID ,AvgPenCount = AVG(d.AvgPenCount) ,SumAF = SUM(d.DropAF) ,SumDM = SUM(d.DropDM) ,SumCost = SUM(d.SumCost) ,AvgCostHd = AVG(d.AvgCostHd) ,AFHd = AVG(d.AvgAFHd) ,DMHd = AVG(d.AvgDMHd) from ( select p.PenGID ,fs.InstanceDate as 'ReportDate' ,SUM(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity, c.MediumMeasurementType)) as 'DropAF' ,SUM(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity * DMPct, c.MediumMeasurementType)) as 'DropDM' ,AVG(pcc.penCount) as 'AvgPenCount' ,isnull(SUM(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity, c.MediumMeasurementType) / Nullif(pcc.penCount, 0)), 0) as 'AvgAFHd' ,ISNULL(SUM(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(UnitQuantity * DMPct, c.MediumMeasurementType) / nullif(pcc.penCount, 0)), 0) as 'AvgDMHd' ,SUM(cst.FIFOCost) as 'SumCost' ,isNull(SUM(cst.FIFOCost) / NULLIF(AVG(pcc.penCount), 0), 0) as 'AvgCostHd' from Location l join Pen p on p.LocationGID = l.LocationGID join FeedingScheduleDrop fsd on fsd.LocationGID = p.LocationGID join FeedingScheduleLoad fsl on fsl.FeedingScheduleLoadGID = fsd.FeedingScheduleLoadGID join FeedingScheduleMix fsm on fsm.FeedingScheduleMixGID = fsl.FeedingScheduleMixGID join FeedingSchedule fs on fs.FeedingScheduleGID = fsm.FeedingScheduleGID join InventoryTransaction it on it.TransactionSourceGID = fsd.FeedingScheduleDropGID join Company c on c.CompanyGID = l.CompanyGID outer apply (select top 1 FIFOCost = dbo.GetFIFOCost(it2.UnitQuantity, fsmi.InventoryItemGID, fsmi.SourceLocationGID, it2.TransactionDT) from FeedingScheduleMixInstruction fsmi join InventoryTransaction it2 on it2.TransactionSourceGID = fsmi.FeedingScheduleMixInstructionGID where it2.InventoryItemGID = it.InventoryItemGID and fsmi.FeedingScheduleMixGID = fsl.FeedingScheduleMixGID order by it2.TransactionDT desc) cst outer apply (select top 1 pcc.[Count] * 1.0 as penCount from PenCountChange pcc where pcc.CreatedDT <= it.TransactionDT and pcc.PenGID = p.PenGID and pcc.InventoryItemType = 3 order by pcc.CreatedDT desc) pcc where it.TransactionDT between CONVERT(date, DATEADD(d, -15, GETDATE())) and CONVERT(date, GETDATE()) group by p.PenGID, fs.InstanceDate) d join Pen p on p.PenGID = d.PenGID group by p.PenGID ) z on z.PenGID = p.PenGID</QueryText> <PreQueryText /> </QueryBundle>
